name: Paradox Wing
description:
Your experimental time-travelling spacecraft is malfunctioning, and it's stuck in a loop only a few seconds long! Even worse, your weapons systems are malfunctioning too, and you're forced to avoid getting shot by the echoes of your past self.

Stay alive through clever maneuvering, and kill your past selves if you must - but keep in mind that such a paradox comes with its own penalties.

"Paradox Wing" was created for the Spring 2021 VT Gaming Project Game Jam. The theme was "Paradox." Have fun!

Credits
  • Music  by RoccoW
  • Other sounds generated using sfxr
